storyInfo: The opening ceremonies of the Major are about to kick off. In Kawalerielki, the Grand Knight Territory, a storm is brewing.

attributes.content: 'The city is a man-eating behemoth, but still we must dwell in its bowels gratefully.'
'We wait until life digests us, until our flesh and bones are excreted, so that whatever remains may become nutrients to feed the city as it lurches onwards.'
'That is the flourishing of civilization.'
Welcome to the Kazimierz National Arena! Welcome... to the Kazimierz Major! I am none other than your old friend –– Greatmouth Mob!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: After a long qualifying stage, this is the moment all of Kazimierz has long been waiting for –– the first match of the Kazimierz Major starts today!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Dueling, jousting, and assorted miscellany! Three categories, eight major events, forty-three minor events! Countless knights and knightclubs will take their share of gold and glory!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: How did Mob end up as the MC? Think he greased some palms behind the scenes?
attributes.name: An Audience Knight

attributes.content: Like he bribed his way in? How much do you think something like that would cost?
attributes.name: A Popcorn-Clutching Knight

attributes.content: Mob's never been the type to keep his mouth shut. What if he let something slip, right here on the big stage?
attributes.name: An Audience Knight

attributes.content: Hah. You hear about that loudmouth, the Bearded Cage? Heard he 'badmouthed' a pretty big deal of a knight during the Major...
attributes.name: A Popcorn-Clutching Knight

attributes.content: ...and that was the last anyone saw of 'im. Want some popcorn?
attributes.name: A Popcorn-Clutching Knight

attributes.content: Pssht. Probably just took the fall and resigned. A by-the-book trick.
attributes.name: An Audience Knight

attributes.content: *munch* I shed... dish-appeared... *munch*... not resigned. You get it?
attributes.name: A Popcorn-Clutching Knight

attributes.content: Huh... No shittin'?
attributes.name: An Audience Knight

attributes.content: Today's Major features eight big knightclubs, sixty-four of the normal ones, and two unaffiliated, independent knights!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The Kazimierz Major is a showcase of the beauty and majesty of our knights for all of Terra to enjoy!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Our first match will pit the Bladehelm Knightclub against the Cloudhaze Knightclub! How many points will the ten knights from each side take home to their clubs?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: A big prize pool is getting bigger as I speak! A portion of everything you spend at this arena will be added to the tournament prize for the knights to fight over!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Which knightclub will take the most trophies? Which knight will stand above the rest and become this Major's Knight-Champion?
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Now... LET US SEE FOR OURSELVES––!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: 5:43 P.M. \ Clear
The Grand Knight Territory Kawalerielki, Wall of Champions
How's the fit, Mr. Malkiewicz?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Good, thanks to you.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: That's enough of that. Custom-tailored formalwear is a must for maintaining our image.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Do you still have the tailor's contact information? I believe you'll find his services most helpful.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Sir, could you please get me a glass of wine? Thank you.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: What's on your mind?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Nothing in particular...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Maybe... This banquet is just too much for me.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Ah, 'maybe.'
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Maybe you haven't gotten over the incident with Mr. Czarny. Quite the shame, for all of us.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: He was a conscientious one, who always put his best foot forward, whether as a company employee or as a spokesman for the K.G.C.C.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: In fact, I only met him after becoming a spokesman myself. In terms of our work in the Majors, he was far senior to a fresh face like me.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: He always treated those he respected well, yes?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Maybe...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Let's do away with these maybes, and lift our spirits instead.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Today is but the second day of the opening ceremonies, and a great day to open the Wall of Champions to the outside world. It would hardly fit the occasion for the resident manager to wear such a dour expression.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Yes, you're right... Sorry...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: You should speak up more, Malkiewicz. And there's no need to be so stiff around me. It's certainly not conducive to our working relationship.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: What was that? Did something happen outside?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Hmm.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: I believe it's a guest of honor, a very important knight. Let me check the time... See, look how punctual she is. We need more knights like her.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Pardon me, I'll be right back. In the meanwhile, do avail yourself of your right to the open bar.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: S-Sure...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: The sweet release of libation is wonderful indeed. You ought to indulge in it.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Madam Droste, we meet again.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Good evening. Am I late?
attributes.name: Droste

attributes.content: Not at all. I'm glad you could make it.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: I do believe the glow of the Candle Knight will add a beautiful touch to tonight's opening banquet.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: 6:15 P.M. \ Overcast
The Grand Knight Territory Kawalerielki – General Chamber of Commerce, Reception Room
I—
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Ah, no need to explain yourself, Platinum. We didn't expect this to happen either... Just doing your job, of course?
You do what you have to do.
I screwed up.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Ah yes, a screwup... But we aren't exactly nine-to-five office drones here. In our line of work, 'screwups' are very serious.
Deadly serious, even.
Luckily this time, you only let the Radiant Knight barge into the Infected quarter... Oh, but that did throw a wrench into Monique's work.
Her job was to make a little fireworks show out of those illegal settlements, and then bring the Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub to Area 0.
It was going so smoothly, but suddenly... from the slaughter came the Radiant Knight, and there went all our plans.
She's very unhappy now, you understand? We all know her temper, and if someone was to get in the way of her bounty, you know how troublesome that'd be.
I didn't know what Monique was doing.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: No, you did know. Besides, whether you knew or not is no excuse.
After all, your job was to 'track the Infected.' Did I not say a long time ago that our jobs would be changing?
Now now, what's with that icy expression? Oh, were you perhaps born with that face, little pegasus?
How seriously can I take someone who submits seventeen or eighteen time-off requests a month? ...Ah, forget it.
Count your lucky stars that the whole thing about the Radiant Knight rushing into an Infected quarters to fight off a group of mysterious assassins didn't make headlines in the major news outlets.
Though the media are still our valued partners, suppressing these kinds of things costs a lot of money. And let me tell you, they don't pass up on these juicy opportunities.
...I'll accept responsibility for these losses.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Your self-awareness is commendable, but you can't afford to 'accept responsibility' for many more mistakes. After all, the Board of Directors only pays you so much, yes?
Sorry.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Hah. Enough of that. Playing the villain isn't exactly my strong suit.
We're still work partners, right?
If you think so, then so it must be, Lord Roy.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Tisk tisk. When you call me that, doesn't it seem like we're strangers? 'Platinum' Centaurea... See, doesn't hearing that make you feel uncomfortable? Why don't we go with a nickname instead, my little pegasus?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Kazimierz has many pegasi.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: It's fine as long as you know I'm referring to you... Oh, right. There's just one more thing, though it's not a very big deal.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: If you're talking about it, there's no way I can treat it as anything less than a big deal.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Then it appears that you misunderstand me. I'm willing to talk to you about all sorts of things, from small talk to important matters... Haha.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Mm. I heard you spared the life of Szewczyk's runt?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Czarny was already removed from his post at that time. I wasn't in the mood to listen to him and kill a kid.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Ah, so frank. That's fine.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Though I also feel bad for Czarny, that isn't the real issue here... Put simply, Szewczyk has gone missing.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Plastic Knight does not come from an esteemed lineage. He's just another tournament upstart.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Though we didn't have any plans to remove him from the picture, he is the property of the Roar Guards Co., and it never bodes well to let someone else take the initiative. We'll definitely get complaints from the K.G.C.C.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Did you find out who did it?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The Infected.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I don't understand. How could a few Infected knights accomplish all this?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Who knows, little Platinum? That's exactly what we're trying to figure out right now.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: But there's one thing you shouldn't misunderstand.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Oh do please illuminate me.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: What we face... is not just a few meager Infected, but rather all the Infected of Kawalerielki.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Mieszko Industries just delivered eight new plates. The purpose of the plate called Area 0 will soon be brought to light.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I've mentioned this before, right? We're going to be real busy.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Good, as long as you understand. *cough* *cough* Hmm...
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: *hiss*... It's too damn hot today, don't you think? How nice it must be to not have to wear a helm...
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Hm, you can't see what's different about me?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: You dyed your hair?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Everything, including my tail. What do you think? Looks good, huh?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Yes, it suits you well.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: What's the meaning of that annoyed look in your eyes?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Don't think I have to answer personal questions, do I?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: But you see, you hold the title of 'Platinum.' White hair, clad in pure white. Monique is Victorian, natural blue hair, lazurite attire. An absolutely perfect fit.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: But look at me, all dark and drab. Standing next to Monique, I'm so out of place, like I'm a janitor or something.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: So out of consideration for our public image, I also decided on a color for myself, heh.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: As long as you're happy.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: 1:22 P.M. \ Clear
The Grand Knight Territory Kawalerielki – Urban Crevices, Infected Gathering
I'm back!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Took you a while, Sona.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Rude. Some stuff happened along the way.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Ashlock's mentioned it before. Back then, during that 'Industrial Incident,' was it the Radiant Knight that helped you?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Ahaha... Is this the celebrity effect? Feels like everyone already knows...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: She...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: What kind of person is she?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Oh, that's adorable. I thought you weren't interested in gossip.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: My hometown...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Back home, there's an arena.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: There were never any tournaments in that small arena. It was just built because that's what you do, you have an arena in a town.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: But back then... was when I started to look up to the knights. It was also where I grew up hearing legends of the Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: It's been many years.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Really? You never mentioned that before.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: And when did you tell me about what you were like as a kid?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Fair. Maybe that is something we should talk about later.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: It was a long road.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: The road to the Grand Knight Territory was so very long. I didn't come all the way here to reminisce about my old home.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: We're just chatting, alright? No need to be so uptight.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Just chatting, huh...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: When the day comes that we can sit around a patisserie with nothing to fear, we can grab Ashlock and Wild Mane and chat the afternoon away.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Good idea.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: So... What kind of person is she?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Well... To be honest, ermm, we only made eye contact. I have no idea if she even saw my face, busy as we were.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: H-Hey, don't look so down! It's not like I could just strike it up with the champion in front of the Armorless assassins.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But, she still rescued an Infected like me, even with eyes on her.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Maybe she really is the Radiant Knight. The very same... as the Infected dream about.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: The what now–– Eh, whatever. How about the poor guy you rescued? The old one?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: He...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: You asking about me?
My arrow's nocked, Infected.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: You'll help me make those lowlife assassins pay the price.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Amiya, and the Doctor of Rhodes Island, please come in. Treat this place as your own home.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: Your rooms are upstairs. The doctors are working up on the twelfth floor.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: Thank you, kind sir.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Haha... There's no need to be so formal, Miss Amiya.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: I never expected the leader of Rhodes Island to be such a lovely, young Cautus girl. Ah, to be young and full of promise.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: Th-There's nothing special about me...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: D-Doctor...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Haha, are you embarrassed?
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: What an adorable girl. If I had a granddaughter, I reckon she'd be about your age.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: My my, her face is beet red.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: But, I must apologize. Considering your unique status, I can't arrange an in-person meeting for you two.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: Mhm... Don't worry, that's perfectly understandable.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So... 'Gravel.'
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: Your orders.
attributes.name: Senomy

attributes.content: This young lady here is a fourth-order campaign knight. You can call her 'Gravel.' She's very promising.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: Hello.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: She will personally take charge of your safety while you are in Kawalerielki. Should you need anything, just let her know, and she will be of service.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: We cannot allow any misfortune to befall our distinguished guests from abroad, not to mention such excellent partners as yourselves, during the Major.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: We understand, sir.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Thank you for your understanding. I've prattled on for long enough, so I'll leave you young people to your business.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: Gravel, please take good care of the Rhodes Islanders.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: As you wish.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Now then... I'll be standing outside the door. If something comes up, just call for me.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Right, okay. Thanks, Gravel.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Amiya. Hey, Amiya. Is she staring at you?;......;Excuse me, but did you need something?

attributes.content: There is one thing... Do you mind if I come a little closer? Yes, just like this, good.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: ......Mmwah.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Hm? What's wrong? Your face is beet red. That's just how I say hello, so don't think too much about it.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Anyway, I'm Gravel, a knight of Kazimierz. It's a pleasure. Hehehe.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: What... What was that all about...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Err, umm... I have heard that sometimes nobles will indeed greet each other with a kiss... And, umm, seeing as how she's a knight...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That's probably all she meant with it, right? Probably...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Haah...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yeah... I guess I have been a bit nervous.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But, that old lady seemed a lot more easygoing than the other Adeptus knights we met earlier.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: How about you, Doctor? Are you tired?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Of course you are. We've been tied up with business and all kinds of formalities since we got to Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: At least you can catch your breath now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ahaha.... Doctor, were you able to take a breather as well?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It would be nice if all the people in charge of the medical mission were as reasonable as that old lady.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But, this is a rare opportunity for us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's said that every few years, the Grand Knight Territory will select a few of the most rapidly developing cities to merge with its own core city.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's a remarkable feat, if you think about it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: The lights from the billboards outside sure are bright.;I always expected this city to be a lot more solemn.

attributes.content: Mm... It's been a bit of a shock for me as well.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even though... I've always heard Nearl talk about her homeland, I never expected the heart of Kazimierz to be like this.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Want to take a look around?;Is there anything you

attributes.content: Hwuh? Ah, um, n-not really... I just don't get to visit big cities like this very often.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: After all, how many Infected get to look out over a thriving city from atop a high-rise hotel...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If Rhodes Island didn't manage to secure a medical business contract, we'd never get to enjoy this luxury.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The only thing is...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can't stop wondering about Nearl... and how she's doing right now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I was shocked when she suddenly announced that she was leaving Rhodes Island.;......;She is the Radiant Knight after all, and this is her home.

attributes.content: Mhm...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ultimately, we should trust her. This is her decision to make.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I just hope she's safe and sound...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But, since Shining and Nightingale are with her, she'll be fine, right?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yup! Let's put our faith in Nearl.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: After all, she is the Radiant Knight—a pinnacle of Kazimierz knighthood, right?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh, Doctor! Quick, look at that big screen outside!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Is that... Nearl?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Margaret, I'm done!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Based on the suggestions you made last time, I adjusted the center of mass and added a retracting function. Now, it should be able to...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Margaret?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: What's on your mind?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Oh, Maria... Sorry, what were you talking about?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You don't usually space out like that. What's wrong?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I heard some of the rumors while I was at Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But this place... really has changed a whole lot.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Yeah... We've sold off a lot of the furniture.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You know Uncle. Were it not for him, we might've moved somewhere else last year.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Yesterday, someone from the Knights Association came by again to harass us. Both you and I, we're always representing some knightclub, or the family. Otherwise...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Don't worry. I'll take care of it.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Hehe, now that's how a big sister should be.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Oh, right, here's your weapon. Master Kowal and I tuned it up for you.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: But, you haven't had any matches lately, right? How'd it get worn out so badly? It's like a bomb went off next to it.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I never realized it before. The sheer number of Infected living in the Grand Knight Territory.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ...Margaret?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Margaret gazes wordlessly at the skyscrapers in the distance.
She can't forget the dark, garbage-choked underground, or the flickering glow of flames.
Now, the Infected can become knights. The Blood Knight did something incredible. Judging by the results, he saved many Infected from misfortune.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But, this is not what a 'knight' should be. The Infected should not be callously treated as playthings just because they suffer from a disease.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Sona... might've just wanted to help those Infected as well.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The factory is running, the mines haven't stopped. The city is still developing, and more and more Infected will end up at the bottom.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: They were all going to be exiled into the wilderness... but Pinus Sylvestris paid for them. Bought all those Infected with no home of their own.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: That's what Master Kowal told me.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Except, that doesn't change anything. They still don't have a place in this city.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Right... some Infected knights have done similar things before, but there's a limit to how many of the Infected poor the General Chamber of Commerce will allow to hide in the city.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...and the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi Kazimierz will?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The ruling class is even more reluctant to watch the Infected walk openly in their city, and they'll also take measures.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: All the news talks about lately is the Infected, and Oripathy research conferences...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: They're whipping up hysteria.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: They media's trying to make ordinary people fear the Infected, even if it threatens to undo the stabilizing effect that the Infected Knights Act has had––
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ––and the scary part is, this kind of rhetoric from the media... almost always succeeds.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Don't always look so glum. No money falls into the pockets of the despondent.
The Radiant Knight is answering a higher calling, helping out the Infected hidden throughout the dark alleys of the city. How noble––
And then what?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Can she give them their lives back? Can she treat their Oripathy? Can she help the Infected fight back against the rest of society?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Who knows? Maybe she can.
Cut the crap, Toland.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Do you have nothing better to do? Why don't you leave the Grand Knight Territory and crawl back to your den of thieves?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Now that the two sisters are safe and sound, there's no more room for me here?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: You've already been paid back.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: That little bit of cash was just a formality. You know exactly the currency we deal in, Master Młynar.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Who gave you permission to come in?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Mmhmm, this carpet isn't half bad.. The Leithanian textiles are being auctioned off tomorrow, yes?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: That's none of your concern.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: The origins of those two Sarkaz knights certainly raise eyebrows. As a Sarkaz myself, I do pity the fate of those 'knights.'
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: But I must remind you, this is no longer part of our business arrangement. My work here was done long ago.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I had my own reasons for coming to Kawalerielki, since it's not something I do often. I wanted to see if we could come to a mutual understanding–– but it seems that isn't possible.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Now now, don't make that face. Our relationship is already much better than it was before, Your Excellency.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: After all, I'm just a no-name bounty hunter. To the Grand Knight Territory, I'm nothing at all. As for you–– Oh my, haha. Sorry.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: It would seem that you're nothing as well. I guess that makes us two peas in the same sickly pod.
attributes.name: Toland
